base_description: Green rectangular dumpster with a black lid.
part_description: The dumpster has a large rectangular body, a hinged black lid, and warning text on the front. It features side handles for lifting.
internal_interaction_description: The lid is attached to the main body with hinges, allowing it to open and close. The handles are fixed to the sides, providing grip points for movement.
external_interaction_description: The dumpster interacts with waste collection vehicles through lifting handles. It serves as a receptacle for waste, interacting with people who deposit trash. The warning text advises against climbing, ensuring safety.
